ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;


var document = JsDom.parse(src);

//获取列表
var links = document.select('.chap_tit > p > a');

var list = [];
for (var i = 0; i < links.size(); i++) {
    var link = links.get(i);
    list.push({
        text: link.text(),
        url: link.attr('href')
    });
}

//排序
list.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.text.match(/\d+/)[0], 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.text.match(/\d+/)[0], 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});


java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

// 获取列表 第一次需要修改的地方 修改正确的css 选择器
var links = document.select('#chapter-list > dd');

var list = [];
for (var i = 0; i < links.size(); i++) {
    var dd = links.get(i);
    var a = dd.select('a').first(); 
    if (a != null) { 
        list.push({
            text: a.text(),
            id: dd.attr('id').replace('c', ''), //获取ID属性 需要自己手动改 第二处需要修改的地
            url: a.attr('href')
        });
    } 
}

// 排序
list.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.id, 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.id, 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#content label")
txt=java.getElement("#content [class=001] p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#content form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)
	}else{
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		
		}
result=txt}catch{result="\n这章正文不存在！！！\n换一章！！！\n或者\n换本书！！！\n或者\n换源！！！"}
</js>

var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

// 获取列表 第一次需要修改的地方 修改正确的css 选择器
var links = document.select('ul> li');

var list = [];
for (var i =0; i < links.size(); i++) {
    var dd = links.get(i);
    var a = dd.select('a').first(); 
    if (a != null) { 
        list.push({
            text: a.text(),
            id: dd.attr('id').replace('ch', ''), //获取ID属性 需要自己手动改 第二处需要修改的地
            url: a.attr('href')
        });
    } 
}

// 排序
list.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.id, 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.id, 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();

    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }

    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#article form")
txt=java.getElement("#article [class=001] p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#article form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)
	}else{
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		
		}
result=txt}catch{result="\n这章正文不存在！！！\n换一章！！！\n或者\n换本书！！！\n或者\n换源！！！"}
</js>
